alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:44AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Washington County through 215 AM CDT... At 144 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Strickler, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... West Fork... Winslow... Devils Den State Park... Strickler... Blackburn... Hogeye... Woolsey... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 42 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
